visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include two series named 'Series 1' and 'Series 2' with the provided data. The chart should also have custom colors and additional configurations such as chart margins, background, and legend.

tooltip.formatter: function () { return 'The value for ' + this.x + ' is ' + this.y + ''; }

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart type is specified as 'spline', and the background color is set to a light gray (#f9f9f9). The chart has custom margins for better spacing. The title and axes labels are styled with specific colors and font sizes to improve readability. The tooltip is customized to display the x and y values in a formatted manner. The data series includes two series named 'Series 1' and 'Series 2', each with its own set of data points and custom colors. The legend is enabled and styled to match the overall theme of the chart. This configuration ensures a visually appealing and informative chart presentation.
